channel.title: Why cant any 525 clients i dl load? REP IF YOU HELP ME
channel.description: Ok, i download 525 clients, i run them... then it loads and says like Checking updates And just sticks there.... or i download another one which says Connecting to server and sticks... can someone help plesase?

item.title: Why cant any 525 clients i dl load? REP IF YOU HELP ME
item.dc:creator: @propaganda propaganda
item.description:
@propaganda wrote:

you need a 525 chache i believe
or maybe you need to just run the server before the client
the run.bat must say listening on port 43594

or change the server in servers.txt in the client
then delete the first item and type in 127.0.0.1:43594
or 0.0.0.0:43594 or [your no-ip here]:43594

Read full topic
item.source: Why cant any 525 clients i dl load? REP IF YOU HELP ME

item.title: Why cant any 525 clients i dl load? REP IF YOU HELP ME
item.dc:creator: @Umah Umah
item.description:
@Umah wrote:

Did you run the 525 server before running the client? They wont load unless the server’s on.

508 source = 508 client
525 source = 525 client

on and on

Read full topic
